snippet: In 12 games since coming to Chicago in a trade with the Red Sox, Kevin Youkilis has had 13 runs batted in and three home runs.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Chicago White Sox beat the Toronto Blue Jays, 2-0; other scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: In 12 games since coming to Chicago in a trade with the Red Sox, Kevin Youkilis has had 13 runs batted in and three home runs.

headline.seo: Youkilis Trade Again Pays Off for White Sox
headline.main: Youkilis, With Two-Run Homer, Again Makes White Sox Glad They Acquired Him
headline.print_headline: Youkilis, With Two-Run Homer, Again Makes White Sox Glad They Acquired Him
